name: Wall Guys (nuagedoux)
description:
This is a solo game, played only with your mouse.  

Break the wall while a character on a speedwalk is getting closer! Create a hole for each character to fit in!  

More and more characters will appear and the speed will increase! 

You will earn points everytime that a character gets through the wall. Be careful, if you fail, you will start over from the beginning!

- Play only with the left-click button of your mouse!

 - Endless game

- React in time as you see the different character shapes!

Nicolas Villard - Producer
